news.title: Airlines cancel more than 1,200 flights ahead of winter storm. Here's what to know
news.description: Airlines waived change fees ahead of a large winter storm and low temperatures after the busy Christmas holiday.

news.title: Nvidia-Groq deal is structured to keep 'fiction of competition alive,' analyst says
news.description: Groq's description of its Nvidia deal as a "non-exclusive licensing agreement" mimics other recent big AI transactions orchestrated by U.S. tech giants.

news.title: Oracle shares on pace for worst quarter since 2001 as new CEOs face concerns about AI build-out
news.description: Investors want to know if Oracle, under new CEOs Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia, can pay for and deliver data centers packed with Nvidia chips for OpenAI.

news.title: Over 300,000 student loan borrowers were denied a new repayment plan, court filing shows — here's why
news.description: Trump officials rejected 327,955 income-driven repayment plan requests from student loan borrowers, according to a recent court filing. Here's what to know.

news.title: S&P 500 hits fresh record high as Wall Street heads for winning week: Live updates
news.description: The S&P 500 reached a new high on Friday and was pacing for weekly gains as traders came back from the Christmas holiday.

news.title: Time to sell silver and buy gold, says Carter Worth
news.description: Carter Worth breaks down the technicals between silver and gold.

news.title: Google is rolling out a new feature allowing users to change their Gmail address
news.description: Google says it is rolling out a feature that lets users change their Gmail addresses in a long-requested update to their email policy.

news.title: The 'Trump-class' battleship faces a large obstacle in its way: Reality
news.description: Even if it were technically feasible, the cost of building the battleship would be prohibitive.

news.title: There are two risks the market isn’t pricing in heading into the new year, according to Apollo’s Torsten Slok
news.description: Apollo chief economist Torsten Slok said that the Supreme Court potentially striking down President Trump's tariffs could be a big headline risk for markets.

news.title: Waymo pauses robotaxis in SF again due to flash flood warnings on Christmas Day
news.description: Waymo again paused it robotaxi service, citing a flash flood warning on Christmas Day.

news.title: Gas prices fall to four-year lows as millions embark on holiday road trips
news.description: The average price of unleaded gasoline in the U.S. is at its lowest since 2021, according to AAA.

news.title: Trust these numbers? Economists see a lot of flaws in delayed CPI report showing downward inflation
news.description: Thursday saw the release of a much lighter-than-expected inflation report for November, and economists are already questioning its significance.

news.title: November consumer prices rose at a 2.7% annual rate, lower than expected, delayed data shows
news.description: Economists polled by Dow Jones expected CPI to have risen 3.1% on an annualized basis.

news.title: Bank of England cuts interest rates, in welcome Christmas boost for consumers
news.description: The Bank of England voted to cut interest rates from 4% to 3.75% in its last monetary policy move of 2025.

news.title: November's inflation report is the first to be released after the shutdown. Here's what to expect
news.description: November's CPI report is expected to show the annual inflation rate at 3.1%, according to economists polled by Dow Jones.

news.title: Watch Fed Governor Christopher Waller speak on interest rates and the race to succeed Powell
news.description: Waller is one of the five finalists considered for to replace Fed Chairman Jerome Powell when his term expires in May.

news.title: Nvidia's Groq deal, S&P's winning week, leather tariffs and more in Morning Squawk
news.description: Here are five key things investors need to know to start the trading day.

news.title: Wall Street wrote off Palantir as too expensive. Retail investors can't get enough
news.description: The stock, which made its market debut in 2020, is an indisputable star of the retail investing world.

news.title: Monetizers vs manufacturers: How the AI market could splinter in 2026
news.description: AI infrastructure firms are set to win from the evolution of once asset-light Big Tech firms.

news.title: DOJ says more than 1 million potential Epstein files newly uncovered
news.description: A bipartisan group of Senators on Wednesday said the Trump administration violated the law by failing to release the records in full last week.

news.title: Libyan army's chief dies in plane crash in Turkey
news.description: The Libyan army's chief of staff, Mohammed Ali Ahmed Al-Haddad, died in a plane crash on Tuesday after leaving Turkey's capital Ankara, the prime minister of Libya's internationally recognised government said, adding that four others were on the jet as well.

news.title: Supreme Court rejects Trump's bid to send National Guard to Chicago
news.description: In an unsigned decision released on Tuesday, the court said Trump lacked the authority to federalize troops in Chicago.

news.title: Epstein files: Latest batch from DOJ includes a personal letter, emails and heavily redacted documents
news.description: The release comes amid intense scrutiny from congressional lawmakers and victims over the DOJ's handling of the Epstein files.

news.title: Greenland PM rebukes Trump special envoy overture
news.description: President Donald Trump on Sunday appointed Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry as a "special envoy" to Greenland.
